overview:
Sasha Grosman is the Director of Marketing of CampusLIVE, Inc, “The College Homepage.” Sasha is an alumni of the University of Massachusetts Amherst (â€™08), graduating Cum Laude with a B.A. in Psychology and a minor concentration in Information Technologies. While managing two jobs to help pay his way through college, Sasha found time to actively participate in intramurals, in his community, and develop multiple skills ranging from the culinary arts to web development and graphic design. Sasha started at CampusLIVE as an intern and was quickly offered a full time position because he displayed high levels of initiative, innovative ideas, and quickly assumed a leadership role within the company.

Sasha, along with the CampusLIVE team, was named 3rd place in the 2008 BusinessWeek “Top 25 Entrepreneurs Under 25.” He has also been honored as an “Emerging Entrepreneur” by Deval Patrick and the Massachusetts Office of Business Development.
